data.description:
A VR tower defense experience where you function as both general and soldier. As the newly appointed Sky Marshall you oversee the defense effort and take on the enemy with bow, zeppelin, and battle orbs! 

STRATEGY AND ACTION
As the sole defender of the realm, you will need to be an effective archer as well as a fast-thinking strategist. The enemy is persistent and strong, and will often attack more than one front. Your ability to keep calm, build the right towers on the right spots, freezing a group of enemies with your battle orbs while nailing head-shots with your bow, will be crucial to your success

ADAPT AND PREVAIL
Throughout your missions, you will confront gradually tougher enemies with various skill sets and stats. No single strategy works for them all. You will have to adapt and experiment with alternative tactics to succeed.

changelog.change_log: This update includes small bug fixes and adjustments to the difficulty. Additionally, we've added leaderboards and updated the game to 90 hz. Thank you for your continued support, and we hope you enjoy the update!

This update includes small bug fixes, including a fix for the game-breaking bug at level 10. We've also made adjustments to the difficulty and added a new upgrade (overload) for the teleport tower. Additionally, we've made some tweaks to the bow to improve gameplay. Thank you for your continued support, and we hope you enjoy the update!
